tooltips.help: Please enter Title for the Knowledge Package.
tooltips.title: Title_TextBox_knowledgeaddpackage

tooltips.help: Click on Add Knowledge Documents button to add Documents to the Knowledge Package.
tooltips.title: AddKnowledgeDocuments_Button_knowledgeaddpackage

tooltips.help: Click on Remove button to remove the SELECTED documents from the Knowledge Package.
tooltips.title: Remove_Button_knowledgeaddpackage

tooltips.help: Please select the Columns from the Dropdown that need to be displayed.
tooltips.title: Columns_DropDown_knowledgeaddpackage

tooltips.help: Click on History link to see the History of Knowledge Documents.
tooltips.title: History_Link_knowledgeaddpackage

tooltips.help: Click on Assignation link to see for the Assignations for Knowledge Package.
tooltips.title: Assignations_Link_knowledgeaddpackage

tooltips.help: Click on Save Button to save the current changes for the Knowledge Package.
tooltips.title: Save_Button_knowledgeaddpackage

tooltips.help: Click on Cancel Button to Cancel the current changes for the Knowledge Package.
tooltips.title: CancelButton_knowledgeaddpackage
